rules: Rule1: If an oil spill occurs in the river, then ecological damage follows in the river.
Rule2: Whenever ecological damage occurs in the river, water contamination follows in the river.
Rule3: If water contamination occurs in the river, then pollution does not happen in the river.
Rule4: Provided that a public protest occurs regarding the river, pollution does not occur in the river.
Rule5: Either the government approves development related to the river or a public protest occurs regarding the river.
Rule6: A cleanup operation is conducted in the river, or it is not the case that the government approves development related to the river.
Rule7: If the river does not have protected status, then pollution occurs in the river.
facts: Fact1: An oil spill occurs in the river.
Fact2: A cleanup operation is not conducted in the river.
